articles.title: Biden asked if he’d pardon Hunter if convicted in gun trial. Hear his response | CNN Politics
articles.description: In an interview with ABC News, President Joe Biden says he will not pardon his son Hunter if he’s found guilty in his federal gun trial. CNN Political Director David Chalian joins Kasie Hunt to discuss.

articles.author: Sarah Jorgensen
articles.title: Trump likes to make this promise a lot. Abby Phillip rolls the tape | CNN Politics
articles.description: CNN’s Abby Phillip weighs in on Donald Trump’s recurring pattern of making promises to deliver plans within a timeframe of “two weeks.”
articles.content: CNN's Abby Phillip weighs in on Donald Trump's recurring pattern of making promises to deliver plans within a timeframe of "two weeks."

articles.author: Sarah Jorgensen
articles.title: Jan. 6 committee member reacts to Trump’s call for indictment of committee members | CNN Politics
articles.description: In a series of social media posts, former President Donald Trump called for the indictment of members of the January 6. committee.  CNN’s Kaitlan Collins gets reaction from one of the committee members, Rep. Zoe Lofgren (D-CA).
